title: Welcome!
content: I'm Liam Fruzyna, a Software Engineer in Motorola Solutions' Applied Technology group.
Before coming to Motorola I graduated from Marquette University in May 2019, double majoring in Computer Science and Data Science.
At Marquette I worked as a Technology Support Assistant, Undergraduate Researcher, and Lead Developer making Python scripts and Android apps, plus my everday course work.
Nowadays at Motorola, I'm working primarily in Python with some C++ and JavaScript on the side.
In my free time I mentor the WildStang Robotics Program where I guide software students in programming robots with Java while rebooting my high school project WildRank.

title: Contact
content: Should you want to contact me for some reason my prefered method is Telegram, you can find me @fruzyna.
Alternatively, my email is my first name at this domain.
